comments: There are several failures when I run the 3.2 performance baselines that are related to JDT-UI.  I thought I would pass them on.  Attaching a zip.

Created an attachment (id=66336)
jdt ui test logs etc from last 3.2 performance baseline run

In the jdt.ui.tests it seems as if rt.jar which is a resource in the test project could not be found.
Markus, any idea?

Created an attachment (id=66433)
Fix for AFE in JavaProjectHelper.findRtJar(..)

> In the jdt.ui.tests it seems as if rt.jar which is a resource in the test
> project could not be found.

Here's the exception:
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
at org.eclipse.jdt.testplugin.JavaProjectHelper.findRtJar(JavaProjectHelper.java:675)
at org.eclipse.jdt.testplugin.JavaProjectHelper.addRTJar(JavaProjectHelper.java:526)
at org.eclipse.jdt.ui.tests.performance.views.CleanUpPerfTest$MyTestSetup.setUp(CleanUpPerfTest.java:69)
at junit.extensions.TestSetup$1.protect(TestSetup.java:18)

The cause of this exception is probably bug 155081. We've branched org.eclipse.jdt.ui.tests to branch perf_32x and used tag v20070411_perf32x (which includes an underscore).

The patch contains the workaround for bug 155081, which works fine in the R3_2_maintenance branch.

Committed the patch and released org.eclipse.jdt.ui.tests with tag v20070509_perf32x for next performance baseline.

AFAICS, all test failures in jdt.ui were caused by this problem (i.e. I saw no class loading errors like in the jdt.text tests in bug 186004).
verified that baseline is available in 20070517-1700
